description: Obtains information about the directories that belong to this account. You can retrieve information about specific directories by passing the directory identifiers in the DirectoryIds parameter. Otherwise, all directories that belong to the current account are returned. This operation supports pagination with the use of the NextToken request and response parameters. If more results are available, the DescribeDirectoriesResult.NextToken member contains a token that you pass in the next call to  DescribeDirectories to retrieve the next set of items. You can also specify a maximum number of return results with the Limit parameter.

parameters.name: DirectoryIds
parameters.description: A list of identifiers of the directories for which to obtain the information. If this member is null, all directories that belong to the current account are returned. An empty list results in an InvalidParameterException being thrown. (string) ---

nested_items.name: DirectoryDescriptions
nested_items.description: The list of available  DirectoryDescription objects that were retrieved.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The directory identifier.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The fully qualified name of the directory.

nested_items.name: ShortName
nested_items.description: The short name of the directory.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The directory size.

nested_items.name: Edition
nested_items.description: The edition associated with this directory.

nested_items.name: Alias
nested_items.description: The alias for the directory. If no alias has been created for the directory, the alias is the directory identifier, such as d-XXXXXXXXXX.

nested_items.name: AccessUrl
nested_items.description: The access URL for the directory, such as http://<alias>.awsapps.com. If no alias has been created for the directory, <alias> is the directory identifier, such as d-XXXXXXXXXX.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for the directory.

nested_items.name: DnsIpAddrs
nested_items.description: The IP addresses of the DNS servers for the directory. For a Simple AD or Microsoft AD directory, these are the IP addresses of the Simple AD or Microsoft AD directory servers. For an AD Connector directory, these are the IP addresses of the DNS servers or domain controllers in your self-managed directory to which the AD Connector is connected.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Stage
nested_items.description: The current stage of the directory.

nested_items.name: ShareStatus
nested_items.description: Current directory status of the shared Managed Microsoft AD directory.

nested_items.name: ShareMethod
nested_items.description: The method used when sharing a directory to determine whether the directory should be shared within your Amazon Web Services organization ( ORGANIZATIONS) or with any Amazon Web Services account by sending a shared directory request ( HANDSHAKE).

nested_items.name: ShareNotes
nested_items.description: A directory share request that is sent by the directory owner to the directory consumer. The request includes a typed message to help the directory consumer administrator determine whether to approve or reject the share invitation.

nested_items.name: LaunchTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the directory was created.

nested_items.name: StageLastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the stage was last updated.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The directory type.

nested_items.name: VpcSettings
nested_items.description: A  DirectoryVpcSettingsDescription object that contains additional information about a directory. This member is only present if the directory is a Simple AD or Managed Microsoft AD directory.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the VPC that the directory is in.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The identifiers of the subnets for the directory servers.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The domain controller security group identifier for the directory.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: The list of Availability Zones that the directory is in.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConnectSettings
nested_items.description: A  DirectoryConnectSettingsDescription object that contains additional information about an AD Connector directory. This member is only present if the directory is an AD Connector directory.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the VPC that the AD Connector is in.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: A list of subnet identifiers in the VPC that the AD Connector is in.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CustomerUserName
nested_items.description: The user name of the service account in your self-managed directory.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The security group identifier for the AD Connector directory.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: A list of the Availability Zones that the directory is in.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConnectIps
nested_items.description: The IP addresses of the AD Connector servers.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RadiusSettings
nested_items.description: A  RadiusSettings object that contains information about the RADIUS server configured for this directory.

nested_items.name: RadiusServers
nested_items.description: An array of strings that contains the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or IP addresses of the RADIUS server endpoints, or the FQDN or IP addresses of your RADIUS server load balancer.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RadiusPort
nested_items.description: The port that your RADIUS server is using for communications. Your self-managed network must allow inbound traffic over this port from the Directory Service servers.

nested_items.name: RadiusTimeout
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, to wait for the RADIUS server to respond.

nested_items.name: RadiusRetries
nested_items.description: The maximum number of times that communication with the RADIUS server is retried after the initial attempt.

nested_items.name: SharedSecret
nested_items.description: Required for enabling RADIUS on the directory.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationProtocol
nested_items.description: The protocol specified for your RADIUS endpoints.

nested_items.name: DisplayLabel
nested_items.description: Not currently used.

nested_items.name: UseSameUsername
nested_items.description: Not currently used.

nested_items.name: RadiusStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the RADIUS MFA server connection.

nested_items.name: StageReason
nested_items.description: Additional information about the directory stage.

nested_items.name: SsoEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates if single sign-on is enabled for the directory. For more information, see  EnableSso and  DisableSso.

nested_items.name: DesiredNumberOfDomainControllers
nested_items.description: The desired number of domain controllers in the directory if the directory is Microsoft AD.

nested_items.name: OwnerDirectoryDescription
nested_items.description: Describes the Managed Microsoft AD directory in the directory owner account.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the Managed Microsoft AD directory in the directory owner account.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the directory owner account.

nested_items.name: DnsIpAddrs
nested_items.description: IP address of the directory's domain controllers.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: VpcSettings
nested_items.description: Information about the VPC settings for the directory.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the VPC that the directory is in.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The identifiers of the subnets for the directory servers.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The domain controller security group identifier for the directory.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: The list of Availability Zones that the directory is in.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RadiusSettings
nested_items.description: A  RadiusSettings object that contains information about the RADIUS server.

nested_items.name: RadiusServers
nested_items.description: An array of strings that contains the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) or IP addresses of the RADIUS server endpoints, or the FQDN or IP addresses of your RADIUS server load balancer.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RadiusPort
nested_items.description: The port that your RADIUS server is using for communications. Your self-managed network must allow inbound traffic over this port from the Directory Service servers.

nested_items.name: RadiusTimeout
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, to wait for the RADIUS server to respond.

nested_items.name: RadiusRetries
nested_items.description: The maximum number of times that communication with the RADIUS server is retried after the initial attempt.

nested_items.name: SharedSecret
nested_items.description: Required for enabling RADIUS on the directory.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationProtocol
nested_items.description: The protocol specified for your RADIUS endpoints.

nested_items.name: DisplayLabel
nested_items.description: Not currently used.

nested_items.name: UseSameUsername
nested_items.description: Not currently used.

nested_items.name: RadiusStatus
nested_items.description: Information about the status of the RADIUS server.

nested_items.name: RegionsInfo
nested_items.description: Lists the Regions where the directory has replicated.

nested_items.name: PrimaryRegion
nested_items.description: The Region where the Managed Microsoft AD directory was originally created.

nested_items.name: AdditionalRegions
nested_items.description: Lists the Regions where the directory has been replicated, excluding the primary Region.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: OsVersion
nested_items.description: The operating system (OS) version of the directory.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If not null, more results are available. Pass this value for the NextToken parameter in a subsequent call to  DescribeDirectories to retrieve the next set of items.
